mapper.select: select u.id as userId,u.user_name as userName,ulm.media_id as mediaId,m.media_name as mediaName,m.image as image,ml.url_name as urlName,ml.url_address as urlAddress from `user` u,media m,media_link ml,user_link_media ulm where u.id = ulm.user_id and ulm.media_id = m.id and ml.link_id = m.id and u.id = #{id} GROUP BY urlName
